description: I like to serve this with baby potatoes or fingerlings, which I cook in salted boiling water before I begin the fish, then drain and keep warm in the covered pot.
title: Sole With Fennel and Blood Oranges
title_page: Sole With Fennel and Blood Oranges Recipe - NYT Cooking
